item.title: How to bet on a UPS comeback after its recent stock rout with lesser risk using options
item.description: Nishant Pant describes a bull call spread on the shipping giant.

item.title: Goldman says the rally in steel stocks on Trump's tariffs can continue, gives 3 names to buy
item.description: Steel stocks advanced Monday on the tariff news, with the group gaining roughly 7%, Goldman noted. By contrast, the S&P 500 rose 1%.

item.title: Bank of America says these two stocks are the best way to play DOGE's efficiency push
item.description: DOGE's restructuring efforts could lead to gains for this defense contractor and this software company, according to Bank of America.

item.title: These 'trade war heroes' can thrive as tariffs look set to rise, says Evercore ISI
item.description: The budding trade war is another economic concern for markets already on edge for signs of persistent inflation and slower growth.

item.title: IBM is a buy that's poised to rally nearly 30%, Oppenheimer says
item.description: Investors are currently underappreciating IBM's pivot to software, according to Oppenheimer.
